JobTitle: Product Line Marketing Manager - Storage - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: The Product Line Marketing Manager will be a key member of the Cloud Platform Business Unit’s storage product marketing team. Product Marketing plays a critical role in successfully driving our products into the marketplace by understanding the current market environment and developing go-to-market strategies to drive customer awareness of our comprehensive product portfolio, from external storage to hyperconverged infrastructure and cloud native storage.Successful PMMs must lead cross-functional teams to successfully meet their objectives. This leadership requires setting the overall vision for product go-to-market strategy, developing core messaging to drive product interest, and influencing many teams towards common goals.As the Product Line Marketing Manager focused on product messaging, positioning, and new product launches, you will drive adoption of VMware’s storage solutions for traditional and cloud native applications across infrastructure types and clouds.Specific responsibilities are as follows:• Craft product positioning and messaging that communicates a differentiated story for VMware products, capabilities and services in the market• Develop core marketing content—from presentations to published articles—that tell a compelling, consistent story based on core messaging and positioning. Collaborate with technology partners on joint messaging and go-to-market motions.• Evangelize product messaging to customers, sales teams, channel partners and technology partners to amplify our story• Develop positioning and persona-based messaging that resonates with customers, relating relevant product capabilities in terms that they understand and care about• Launch new products and solutions to market by developing and leading a successful launch plan across functional teams, including product management, engineering, corporate marketing and support• Acquire sufficient technical understanding of products, technologies and industry to translate product details into clear business benefits• Build deep customer knowledge through market research, segmentation analysis and customer interviews• Develop thought leadership messaging targeted at industry influencers and CxO level customer audiencesJob requirements are as follows:• 3+ years experience in product marketing at a B2B technology firm. Enterprise IT or similar data center experience preferred.• Domain experience in storage, cloud-native applications, hyper converged infrastructure or enterprise IT with a background in the infrastructure space.• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.• Demonstrated ability to create compelling product messaging and translate technology features into business benefits.• Demonstrated aptitude for quickly coming up to speed on new technology concepts and leveraging them to develop innovative solutions.• Collaborative leader, self-starter and proven team player in a high achievement-oriented environment.• Willingness to travel as required• BA/BS in Computer Science or similar technical degree a plus.
